alert.note: Alert for Chatham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 12:01AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Chatham County through 1245 AM EDT... At 1159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pittsboro, moving east at 5 mph. The nearly stationary storm has already produced over an inch of rain near Pittsboro, and up to another inch is possible. HAZARD...Heavy Rainfall, minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall could cause flooded roadways, especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Pittsboro, Crosswinds Boating Center, Jordan Lake State Rec Area, Seaforth Boat Dock, Bynum, Crosswinds Campground, Moncure and Jordan Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Very heavy rain can be expected due to the slow movement of this storm. Prolonged heavy rain will result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks and streams. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
